void HouseTypeExt::HouseTypeExt::ExtData::Initialize ( TT *  pThis  )  [virtual] 

00146 {
00147         this->Powerplants.Clear();
00148 
00149         BuildingTypeClass * pPower = NULL;
00150 
00151         switch(pThis->SideIndex) {
00152                 case 0:
00153                         pPower = RulesClass::Global()->GDIPowerPlant;
00154                         break;
00155                 case 1:
00156                         pPower = RulesClass::Global()->NodRegularPower;
00157                         break;
00158                 case 2:
00159                         pPower = RulesClass::Global()->ThirdPowerPlant;
00160                         break;
00161         }
00162         if(pPower) {
00163                 this->Powerplants.AddItem(pPower);
00164         }
00165 
00166         this->_Initialized = is_Inited;
00167 }

void HouseTypeExt::HouseTypeExt::ExtData::LoadFromINIFile ( TT *  pThis,
CCINIClass *  pINI 
) [virtual] 

00212 {
00213         char* pID = pThis->ID;
00214 
00215 /*
00216         discarding this - special case, needs to load things even before the rules is done
00217         if(this->_Initialized != is_Inited) {
00218                 return;
00219         }
00220 */
00221 
00222         if(!this->Powerplants.Count) {
00223                 switch (pThis->SideIndex) {
00224                         case 0:
00225                                 pINI->ReadString("General", "GDIPowerPlant", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength);
00226                                 break;
00227                         case 1:
00228                                 pINI->ReadString("General", "NodRegularPower", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength);
00229                                 break;
00230                         case 2:
00231                                 pINI->ReadString("General", "ThirdPowerPlant", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength);
00232                                 break;
00233                 }
00234                 if(strlen(Ares::readBuffer)) {
00235                         if(BuildingTypeClass *pBld = BuildingTypeClass::Find(Ares::readBuffer)) {
00236                                 this->Powerplants.AddItem(pBld);
00237                         }
00238                 }
00239         }
00240 
00241         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "AI.PowerPlants", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00242                 this->Powerplants.Clear();
00243                 for(char *bld = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readDelims); bld; bld = strtok(NULL, Ares::readDelims)) {
00244                         if(BuildingTypeClass *pBld = BuildingTypeClass::Find(bld)) {
00245                                 this->Powerplants.AddItem(pBld);
00246                         }
00247                 }
00248         }
00249 
00250         this->RandomSelectionWeight = pINI->ReadInteger(pID, "RandomSelectionWeight", this->RandomSelectionWeight);
00251 }

void HouseTypeExt::HouseTypeExt::ExtData::LoadFromRulesFile ( TT *  pThis,
CCINIClass *  pINI 
) [virtual] 

00170 {
00171         char* pID = pThis->ID;
00172 
00173         this->InitializeConstants(pThis);
00174 
00175         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "File.Flag", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00176                 strncpy(this->FlagFile, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00177 //              Debug::Log("Got [%s]File.Flag = %s\n", pThis->get_ID(), this->FlagFile);
00178                 //Load PCX File so it can be drawn
00179                 PCX::LoadFile(this->FlagFile);
00180         }
00181 
00182         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "File.LoadScreen", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00183                 strncpy(this->LSFile, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00184         }
00185 
00186         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "File.LoadScreenPAL", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00187                 strncpy(this->LSPALFile, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00188         }
00189 
00190         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "File.Taunt", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00191                 strncpy(this->TauntFile, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00192         }
00193 
00194         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "LoadScreenText.Name", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00195                 strncpy(this->LSName, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00196         }
00197 
00198         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "LoadScreenText.SpecialName", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00199                 strncpy(this->LSSpecialName, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00200         }
00201 
00202         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "LoadScreenText.Brief", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00203                 strncpy(this->LSBrief, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00204         }
00205 
00206         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "MenuText.Status", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00207                 strncpy(this->StatusText, Ares::readBuffer, 0x20);
00208         }
00209 }
